Tucson raises a brow after hearing Silverbolt's encouraging words.

" I can=
't hide anything can I?  A good friend always knows what his comrade is thi=
nking, and no matter how saddened one is, he can always feel good that he h=
as friends standing beside him.  It's very good to know I have you and the =
others for support. I should consider myself very lucky to be a part of a p=
owerful merger of factions.  Now, Rodimus's health is declining, and I have=
 more than enough spark to share.  I think it is time that you allow me to =
attempt a form of energy transfusion.  It may be his only hope of recovery.=
"

He establishes a com link to Stanton and Legacy.

"Stanton, Legacy, I am=
 more than honored to have you working so diligantly on saving Rodimus Prim=
e, and now it is my turn to give something back in exchange for the undaunt=
ing dedication you are showing our factions.  My spark has more than enough=
 power to transfuse energy from my body into his.  Not to worry, I will not=
 go off line.  It may be our only hope of saving Rodimus Prime.  It is not =
a request, it is my order."
